title: K-Lite Codec Pack 10.6.8 (Full)
description:
version 10.6.8 ~ 13.34 MB ~ September 1st 2014

Update for:

K-Lite Codec Pack 10.6.5 and newer (Basic/Standard/Full/Mega)

Changelog:

Updated MPC-HC to version 1.7.6.211
Updated LAV Filters to version 0.62-20-g289e158
Updated Codec Tweak Tool to version 5.8.6
Improved HEVC video decoding performance
MPC-HC now supports displaying external coverart (e.g. folder.jpg) when playing audio files. Support for embedded coverart will be added in a future version.

Filename: klcp_update_1068_20140901.exe
Size: 13.783 KB
MD5: 8ea146d43d65852b32941bb08e63afbb
SHA256: 789a1ba96190eaa9daf880577c97ee0ddf6f3f5ae516e95b5873cd7cc9a6154e

Previous versions

The update pack above is only capable of updating a recent version of the codec pack. To update an older version you need to install the latest version of the complete installer (K-Lite_Codec_Pack_1065_Full). Once that is installed, you can install the update above if necessary.

The complete installers can be used to update any version of the codec pack. You can simply install on top of your current installation. The installer will automatically notify you if it is needed to uninstall the old version first, and offers to do that automatically.
